name: Echoes of a Ranger
description: You discover a damaged holotape left behind by NCR Ranger Harlan Voss. Its contents hint at the disappearance of his son, Jax.

stages.name: Find the Holotape
stages.description: You found a damaged holotape labeled 'VOSS-01'. It appears to belong to NCR Ranger Harlan Voss.

stages.name: Play the Holotape
stages.description: Play the holotape to hear Harlan's message.

stages.name: Investigate the Coordinates
stages.description: The holotape mentions coordinates tied to Jax's disappearance. Travel to the marked location.

stages.name: Search the Ruins
stages.description: Search the ruined scavenger camp for clues about Jax.

stages.name: Read Harlan's Note
stages.description: Read the note left behind by Harlan.

stages.name: Quest Complete
stages.description: You have uncovered the first clues about Jax's disappearance. More questions remain.
